ComicInfo.Summary: Dara lost the sword and Victor taste the unstoppable power of it. Now Victor faces his old boss, Knossos, to take control of the organization. While the god and the thug battle to death, Dara realizes that she has only one chance to take back the sword and finish once and for all with Knossos, even if this chance finishes her life.
